# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Our product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering its market worth. We believe this price aligns well with the benefits and features our product offers, making it an attractive proposition for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
